title: If Riot f-ck up Project Jinx
body:
I will kill one lamb for each day that passes before she's fixed in protest.

Starting now I will kill one cricket per day that this Skin isn't released.

replies.body: Lol Jinx mains are as crazy as her.
P.s she better shoot lasers and her ultimate better be a big Death Star Laser type pulse of a beam 6 metres long.
Also Chompers can be starfish or crabs in the upcoming pool party skin I know you are working on.
